name: scribe-css-build
description: Build tools for Scribe ESP32-C3 Thermal Printer CSS

scripts.build-js: npx terser data/js/config.js data/js/shared.js data/js/messaging.js data/js/diagnostics.js data/js/index.js --compress --mangle --output data/js/app.min.js --source-map
scripts.build-js-prod: npx terser data/js/config.js data/js/shared.js data/js/messaging.js data/js/diagnostics.js data/js/index.js --compress --mangle --output data/js/app.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build-css && npm run build-js
scripts.build-prod: npm run build-css-prod && npm run build-js-prod
